definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: 1Sa 11:8 ([[בְּבָָזֶק]]) rendezvous of Israel under Saul and Sam.; Ju Jdg 1:4, Jdg 1:5 home of Adoni-bezek; on loc. cf. Euseb. Lag:Onom. 105, 2nd ed. 139; see also Stu. Ju Jdg 1:4; 17th (mile-)stone fr. Neapolis toward Scythopolis; mod. Ḫirbet Ibzîḳ, 14 Eng. m. fr. Nâblus, Survey:ii. 231.
